PricingProcedureResolution.name: PricingProcedureResolution
PricingProcedureResolution.description: Represents a selection for a pricing procedure to execute a pricing process from a list of pricing procedures available.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only if the multicurrency feature is enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date and time when the pricing procedure resolution comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: The date and time till when the pricing procedure resolution remains effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: Indicates whether the pricing procedure resolution has been archived (true) or not (false). This field is read-only.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the pricing procedure resolution.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the sales representative who owns the pricing procedure resolution.

PricingProcedureId.description: The pricing procedure record associated with this pricing procedure resolution.

ProcedureType.description: The pricing data store associated with this pricing recipe field mappings.
